a printable pdf file which will be available for immediate download after purchase the pdf file consists of a total of 8 pages including cover images copyright and information about the designer there is step by step detailed instructions with pictures to make the cute amigurumi ghost pattern pictured in this listing this is a pdf file for an adorable crochet ghost pattern it was written using standard us terminology approximate size of the finished amigurumi ghost the ghost will be approx 5 5 14 cm tall without the hat and the hat will be approx 2 5 6 5 cm tall yarn used worsted weight #4 100% cotton yarn approximate amount of yarn needed ghost white 1 57 oz 45 g or 76 yds 69 m hat black currant classis purple 0 23 oz 7 g or 11 yds 10 m and a small amount of black for the hat stripe mouth use tiny scraps of pink yarn or thread or other color you like materials and tools 3 5 mm us e hook stitch marker a pair of 8mm or 10mm safety eyes tool for placing safety eyes optional stuffing fiber stuffing tool optional i use a hemostat tapestry needle gauge gauge is not important for this project please refer to the finished project size for reference language english us level of difficulty easy you will need these skills without the need of a tutorial amigurumi magic_ring chain single_crochet increase single_crochet invisible decrease single_crochet half_double_crochet
